50 
51 /*Maximum number of different monitoring reports*/
52 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MAX_NUM_MON 40
53 /*Analog monitoring*/
54 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TEMP 0U
55 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_GAIN_PH 1U
56 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_NOISE_FIG 2U
57 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_IF_STAGE 3U
58 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX0_POWER 4U
59 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX1_POWER 5U
60 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX2_POWER 6U
61 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX0_BALL_BRK 7U
62 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX1_BALL_BRK 8U
63 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX2_BALL_BRK 9U
64 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX_GAIN_PHASE 10U
65 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX0_BPM 11U
66 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX1_BPM 12U
67 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX2_BPM 13U
68 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_SYNTHESIZER_FREQ 14U
69 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_EXTERN_ANALOG_SIG 15U
70 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX0_INT_ANA_SIG 16U
71 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX1_INT_ANA_SIG 17U
72 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_TX2_INT_ANA_SIG 18U
73 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_INT_RX_SIG 19U
74 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_INT_PMCLKLO_SIG 20U
75 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_INT_GPADC_SIG 21U
76 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_PLL_CONTROL_VOLT 22U
77 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_DCC_CLOCK_FREQ 23U
78 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_IF_SATURATION 24U
79 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_SIG_IMG_BAND 25U
80 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_MIXER_INP_POWER 26U
81 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MAX_NUM_ANALOG_MON_REP (MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_RX_MIXER_INP_POWER + 1)
82 /*Digital monitoring*/
83 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_DIG_LATENT_FAULT 30U
84 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_DIG_PERIODIC_REP 31U
85 /*Calibration*/
86 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_CALIBRATION_REP 35U
87 /*Monitoring header*/
88 #define MMWAVELINK_TEST_MON_REPORT_HEADER (MMWAVELINK_TEST_MAX_NUM_MON - 1)
